_sText:
Extraxt all files to the Counterstrike Source maps folder.

================================================================================
* LEVEL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TITLE                   : cs_beirut II
FILENAME                : cs_beirut2_hdr.bsp
AUTHOR                  : Bluestrike McQueen
DATE                    : 25 februari 2007 
GAME                    : half-Life 2 COunter-Strike Source.
EMAIL ADDRESS           : Bluestrike@bluestrike.be
HOMEPAGE URL            : http://www.bluestrike.be
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* LEVEL DESCRIPTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Map is set in a fortiefied montain/desert town.
While this has nothing to do with Beirut, I used that title
because my popular cs map was also called cs_beirut, and both
maps have simular layout/gameplay.
(the orriginal map had nothing to do with beirut either but I had the
map idea after watching a movie with Chuck Norris who had to free hostages
in beirut :P )
 
NEW TEXTURES            : My logo, some custom skins and modified blend vmt's.
NEW MODELS		: A few props

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CONSTRUCTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MAP BASE                : de_fort & cs_beirut for HL1.
MAP VERSION		: build 88 
PREFABS USED            : none
EDITOR(S) USED          : Hammer 4,0, Softimage XSI and Paint Shop Pro7
OTHER UTILITIES USED    : none 
KNOWN BUGS              : none.
 
COMPILE MACHINE         : Core2duo Qx6700 2gb DDR2
 
compile time		: Around 1,5 hours for a -final compile.
time spend on building 	: V 1.0 3 months shared with another map 
			  V 1.3 update 2 years after initial release. 
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* OTHER LEVELS BY THE AUTHOR *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Too many to name but here is a pick:

Singleplay:

  Awakening (Half-Life 2) http://awakening.hl2files.com/
  Nickrock (Farcry)

Multiplay:

  cs_beirut (Counter-strike)
  de_kilo (Counter-strike)
  
  de_kilo2 (Counter-strike source)
  de_battleship (Counter-strike source)
  cs_logistic_assault (Counter-strike source)

  ins_karkar (insurgency HL2 mod)
  ins_escort (insurgency HL2 mod)

  ctf_portalstorm (ctf HL2 mod)


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS / ADDITIONAL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fixes in version 65
- For some reason there were no 64 spawnpoints this version fixes that.
- Added a way for ct's to get on the middle wall
- Removed acces to walls in corner where terrorists could shoot at ct's
  comming from spawn.
- Added some extra models.
- Removed dustcloud effects and several models for better framerates.

Fixes in version 64:
- Added extra spawnpoints up to 34 vs 34 for 64 player servers.
- Added start view locations when the map is loaded and players are in the 
  team select menu.
- Added a rope at the back side of a building near CT spawn so CT's can
  get on higher ground too, this should even out the odds a bit.
- A few little graphical changes. 

Fixes in hdr version:
- Added custom models and skins.
- Added hdr support.
- Added 'green' radar image.
- Some tweaks.
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CREDITS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Valve for their awesome game and support
Thanks to all the tutorial makers out there.
Thanks to the people who gave valuable feedback.
Thanks to the playtesters of Zarok (www.counterstrike.be)


================================================================================
* COPYRIGHT / PERMISSIONS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Redistributing is allowed.

Bluestrike, Belgium.
